EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Video Link - Making Your Primus 1000/2000 Cockpit Cool Again with Primus Elite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> WEBINAR VIDEO LINK NOW AVAILABLE Hello, The video replay of Making Your Primus 1000/2000 Cockpit Cool Again with Primus Elite webinar is now available.
Please click HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/recording/share/mDCo4IeLAHZvl38ll99sIxBI7Cw4qgt9IwaZHGwPEn2wIumekTziMw?startTime=1555599737000]]> to retrieve the video. Due to storage purposes, this link is only valid for the next two weeks.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the next webinars, events, product launches and more!
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you again.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace
